channel.title: Sylvion.org - Programming/Rsps Community
channel.description:
Hello people,
I am guess i am new to Moparisthebest.com. But i am not new to Moparscape.org. Anyways i wanted to make a community of many different things much like this one.
Mod Taharok said that it is one of the most balanced choice of boards he had seen in a long time and that it looked prommising.
And i promiss to be on regularly, all i want is some more people to visit as we will have downloads and tutorials ect.
Before you say anything flamelike or get angry at me let me say That Pwnd approved of this site and gave me the permission to post it here.
I hope to see some of use there and im hoping this will become big along side of mopar :)
Please post your comments below.
Site Url: http://sylvion.org/smf
By the way it will be a Simple Machine Forum as the url suggest, for those of you who like these forums.
So come check it out! and if you do register please can you POST to get us going :P
Here is a picture:
[img]http://sylvion.org/images/forumspic.png[/img]

item.title: Sylvion.org - Programming/Rsps Community
item.dc:creator: @Try_Me Try Me
item.description:
@Try_Me wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:4, topic:116621”]Baha.
Too busy looking at pwnds avy lol
Yea so, I’m in good mode, I’ll register.[/quote]
How does one change there mode? By a switch?[quote=“dev eXer, post:7, topic:116621”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=165898.msg1544811#msg1544811 date=1182853468]
Worth to look at because its not a SMF for free. And it is a .org…
Or those gay skins that people add…
Or steal MITBs awards…

But there is one thing that bothers me…

Why does it have, on the banner, a firefox icon? I dont know how that fits in with " Runescape private server revolution"
[/quote]
MITB stole some cups from kaitnieks ^^.[/quote]
Kaitneiks stole some cups from Pokemon… Dont forget that ^-^;

Read full topic
